## Activity.owner property

User who owns the Activity. The User who starts an Activity becomes the owner of the Activity. Ownership can be transferred to someone else using the ReAssign method. Only the owner can Finish the Activity.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get owner(): Link | undefined;
```
